name: ESPLORA
details:
fuzzEsplora means "explore".
This effect pedal is a timeless fuzz that offers many different tonal possibilities.
It has two toggle switches.
LEFT ONE: at the upper position, allows to bypass the tone control for a true tonal punch, releasing all the frequencies available without any kind of cut.
RIGHT ONE: at the lower position, gives brightness to the gain and boosts the trebles, making the sound more aggressive and modern.
It has three adjustable parameters: Level, Tone and Fuzz/Sustain.
The ESPLORA can make the difference for any musical genre which needs a real sonic boost, allowing to play the classic fuzz sound or experimenting with the endless options that this pedal offers.
Best electronic parts for the highest quality.
Digital printed graphics for the longest lifetime.
Top-mounted jack to save space on pedalboard.
Hand-built and designed in Italy.
True bypass switching.
Standard 9V DC negative power.
http://www.acnoises.com/fuzz/9-combatti.html
